backend/main.mo: Defines the core backend actor with project, user profile, logs, authorization mixins, and comparison utilities for various record types.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration logic converting old user profiles to the new standardized role-based structure.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata listing feature IDs, related files, components, and test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides humanâ€‘written summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styling defining OKLCH brand color variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint mounting the React app root and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React Router structure, authentication gating, and global providers such as theming and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserRoleMa: Dialog component that assigns roles to users by principal ID using a mutation hook and UI inputs.
frontend/src/components/daily-logs/Inter: Component to add, list, and remove work interruptions, calculating duration from start and end times.
frontend/src/components/daily-logs/Photo: Image uploader that converts selected files to data URLs, displays previews, and allows removal.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DelayA: Analyzes recent project activity logs for performance delays and collects risk data across projects.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Simple layout wrapper that renders a top navigation bar and main content container.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar with routing, user display, logout handling, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/projects/CreateP: Modal form component for creating a project, handling validation, date conversion to bigint, and triggering the createProject mutation.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Dialog for viewing assigned users and adding new users to a project via the assignUser mutation.
frontend/src/components/reports/DprViewe: Displays a formatted daily progress report with aggregated metrics and activity details for a selected project and date.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches the backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, loading, login, and logout flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, projects, assignments, roles, and daily logs.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes with global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/delayDetection.ts: Analyzes daily logs to detect low-productivity delays per activity and returns alert objects.
frontend/src/lib/pdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML report for a project's daily logs using a popup print window.
frontend/src/lib/roles.ts: Provides role labels, normalization helpers, and role-checking utilities for standardized roles.
frontend/src/lib/suggestions.ts: Creates actionable suggestions based on delay alerts such as manpower, workflow, or interruption issues.
frontend/src/lib/timeCalculations.ts: Calculates hour differences and totals pause durations for interruptions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Displays project productivity analytics with selection controls and activity performance metrics.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with redirect on success and error handling via toasts.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RegisterPage.tsx: Registration flow that logs in via Internet Identity, collects user profile details, and saves them before redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/DailyLogEntryPage.tsx: Provides a full form for entering daily logs, including interruptions, photos, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays dashboard metrics, user greeting, quick actions, and project/log status cards using data from various query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with marketing content, feature highlights, and navigation buttons for login and registration.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to view and edit their profile details, save updates, and access change-password functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PlanningPage.tsx: Enables selecting a project and adding or saving planned activity targets with validation and form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Shows all projects and provides admin actions such as creating new projects and managing user roles.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Page for generating daily progress reports by selecting a project and date, viewing filtered logs, and exporting a PDF.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL or session.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, architecture, UI themes, roles, and requirements for the NirmaanIQ app.
